name: La receta de la nonna
description:
An emotional adventure through Memory Lane. "La receta de la Nonna" is our submission to GGJ23. Based on the edition "roots" theme, this game follows the memories of an old man trying to remember his ancestry.

"La receta de la Nonna" is only available in Spanish as of now.
